result.name: database-of-english-visitor-attractions
result.notes: A database of all English visitor attractions which VE is aware of, compiled to use as sample in the Annual Survey of Visits to Visitor Attractions
result.title: Database of English Visitor Attractions

extras.value: No plan to publish (though details of attractions who respond to our survey and agree for information to be made available are published as part of the results for the Annual Attractions Survey)

In theory, the database could be published in anonymised form i.e. with details of attraction type and location. However, considerable resource would be required to check that this was truly anonymous (e.g. if a local authorty only has 1 stately home, this would not be anonymous). VE will be launching a new corporate website in 2014, and as part of this, couldpublish information about the structure of the attractions sector in England
